<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2725</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The effect of the asteroid which collided with earth at the end of the Cretaceous Period.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt des Planetoides, der mit Masse am Ende
der kreidigen Periode zusammenstieß.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de l'asteroïde qui s'est heurté la 
terre à la fin de la période crétacée.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito do asteroid que colidiu com a terra no 
fim do período cretaceous.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto dell'asteroide che si è scontrato con 
terra alla conclusione del periodo cretaceo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση asteroid που συγκρούστηκε με τη γη στο 
τέλος της κρητιδικής περιόδου.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto del asteroide que chocó con tierra en 
el final del período cretáceo.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of the effects of the collision of the Asteroid with the earth, at the end of the Cretaceous period.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation der Effekte des Zusammenstoßes vom 
Planetoid mit der Masse, am Ende der kreidigen Periode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation des effets de la collision de l'asteroïde 
avec la terre, à la fin de la période crétacée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation dos efeitos da colisão do asteroid com a 
terra, no fim do período cretaceous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione degli effetti dello scontro dell'asteroide 
con la terra, alla conclusione del periodo cretaceo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα των αποτελεσμάτων της σύγκρουσης 
asteroid με τη γη, στο τέλος της κρητιδικής περιόδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de los efectos de la colisión del 
asteroide con la tierra, en el final del período cretáceo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
